adaa.analytics.rules.logic.induction

Class AbstractSeparateAndConquer

  • java.lang.Object
    • adaa.analytics.rules.logic.induction.AbstractSeparateAndConquer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassificationSnC, RegressionSnC

    public abstract class AbstractSeparateAndConquer
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract base class for all separate and conquer algorithms for induction of rule-based models (classification, regression, survival).
